TestCase.Title: Check select Master Card AID
TestCase.Purpose: Try to select the EMV application with the Master Card ID. This is a way of identifying the type of the connected card.

Precondition.Description: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

Command.Text: Select the EMV application with a plain select Application APDU

TestStep.Description: {lc} defines the length of the given {aid}
